reviews.headline: Flaky
reviews.comments: This has to be the worst flaky product I've tried in a long time. Literally washed my hair, used this product, and next day the product is flaking off everywhere. Curls are great but I can with all the flaking

reviews.headline: Rely on this to tame my curls
reviews.comments: Love it!

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: In my opiniom the price is worth it. I always recommend finding a coupon of course or sale day. I have fine curly hair with slight wave. This stuff is the bomb. I apply after shower then scrunch. I air dry then ruffly my hair a bit and adds lovely soft volume. Product makes me feel sexy!!

reviews.headline: Best thing to ever exist
reviews.comments: Makes hair bouncy without making it hard

reviews.headline: Favorite hair cream for dense curls
reviews.comments: I have very curly, dry coarse hair and this stuff is the holy grail. It keeps my hair hydrated and soft with well defined curls. I use this with the leave in conditioner and gel mouse. I can go days without washing now and use the gel mouse on refresh days. I'd recommend using this on very wet hair right out of the shower

reviews.headline: Pump doesn't work
reviews.comments: The pump wont pop open, I'm super disappointed, especially with this being pricey. I still twisted off the cap and tried some and it worked well so I wish i didnt have to return

reviews.headline: great product
reviews.comments: i love this product for my wavy/curly hair- the result is soft bouncy curls

reviews.headline: Formula change
reviews.comments: This used to be my go to for styling, but not anymore since the formula change. The ingredients now contain Alcohol, which has dried out my hair. They said it was due to the Phenoxyethanol that was already in the ingredients, but before the formula change, my hair loved this, lasted for days, and never felt dry. Please bring back the old formula!

reviews.headline: My coily hair loves it
reviews.comments: I have coily type 4 hair for reference. And I love the way it glides thru, softens my hair, and how it leaves my hair soft and buildup free. The hold last for days but there are still areas in my hair that are frizzy and not defined (could be user error or the product doesn't have enough hold).

reviews.headline: My daily go to cream!
reviews.comments: I love this cream, been using for almost a year now. A little goes a long way for thinner hair. Smell is nice.

reviews.headline: Really really great
reviews.comments: Its awesome for my finer curly hair. Styles my hair beautifully and doesnt contain drying alcohols or anything that would weigh hair down. Consistency is between a gel and a cream. For reference my hair is 3b or c and its short (im a guy) so dont have to use a lot and it makes the hair look near and has hold.

reviews.headline: My HG
reviews.comments: I get so excited when this is on sale for 21 Days of Beauty so i can stock up! Ive tried a LOT of styling products for my curly/coily hair but i always come back to re:coil. Nothing else works as well. My curls look defined and shiny. Always get compliments when i use this. Yes it's pricey, but well worth it- especially when it's on sale!!!

reviews.headline: Works so good!
reviews.comments: This product was on a 50% off deal so I took a chance. I'm so glad I did! I have wavy/some curls..super frizzy hair. This is all I put on my hair. It dries super stiff, but once you break the cast it gives me frizz free waves all day! I love it!

reviews.headline: My new favorite
reviews.comments: I feel like I finally found the perfect leave in conditioner!! I have 3b/3c hair that is VERY prone to frizzing if i don't have a strong cream and gel. This does both! Though I can see why people complain about their hair being too crunchy. Truthfully, I don't mind crunchy hair and day one because it maintains my curls well and it looks better throughout the week. I also find it really easy to refresh my hair, but if you want something with a light hold, this product isn't for you. I really recommend this for people who are prone to frizzy hair and need a really strong hold.

reviews.headline: Awful crunchy hair.
reviews.comments:
It litterally says on the bottle, "without stiffness" not true. I have fine loose curly hair. I usually use a leave in conditioner to my my curls look bouncy and not frizzy. 
I used a little of this product on my damp hair and scrunched as directed. First of all my hair became very stiff amd crunchy, 2nd it didnt reduce my frizz and didnt make my curls look nice. It also looks dull. Wouldn't recommend this for fine hair at all. I should have listened to bad reviews

reviews.headline: Literally my FAVORITE product ever
reviews.comments: I love this product. Love it love it love it. I like it best on wet but not soaking wet hair, raked through in sections and then brush styled through everything to make sure it is evenly distributed. I'll try different products and I always come back to this. It doesn't give a super strong hold so I like to pair it with their mousse gel after I plop my hair to get all of the extra water out before diffusing. I've even gotten several of my curly haired friends to try this and they love it too.

reviews.headline: Crunchy
reviews.comments: I bought this because all the reviews, I have fine hair. I didn't use a lot of it, but my hair was crunchy and I hated it.

reviews.headline: Great for curls
reviews.comments: Purchased this based on online reviews and it did not disappoint! Great weight/hydration for my type 3 curls. I will be repurchasing

reviews.headline: Took me a few tries.
reviews.comments: Took me a few tries to finally get it right, well I sure did! Now on wash days I use this after the Fast Food AG Care leave in conditioner, while my hair is still damp, air dry overnight, the next morning my hair is dry and my curls are fabulous! I take my hair down and spray some Curlsmith Hold Spray on and good to go! Had to figure out how much to use my hair is past my shoulders, just took a few tries. My curls look good with a little fresh up for two days after washing. This is a great brand, been using for a few months now, definitely recommend! Thankfully purchased on sale, or with an Ulta prestige coupon! Love this!

reviews.headline: Did not work great on thick hair
reviews.comments: I was hoping this would be the product to define the curl in my hair. I have a lot of hair so felt I had to use more to cover hair. By mid day felt greasy.

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product in my FabFitFun summer 2021 box. I rarely write reviews but my experience with this product has been so incredible that I just have to share. I have 3a/3b curls, and my hair is long, very thick, and coarse. I never blow dry and rarely use any heated styling tools. My curls typically look good on wash day but once I sleep on my hair or run my fingers through or brush it, I lose a lot of the curl and it ends up looking....meh.  I have been looking for years for a product that will retain my curls without making my hair sticky or hard, and this is it!! I find it works best when I apply it right out of the shower, when my hair is still pretty wet.  I have a lot of hair but I would say I use about a quarter-size dollop, maybe a smidgen more. My hair is pretty heavy so I will flip my head upside-down and scrunch up the curls 3-4 times while it's air-drying, this gives me a tighter curl and also helps break up the crunchy cast. My day 2 is now full of gorgeous curls, soft but still well-defined. The curls hold up well in the heat and humidity too. This is a holy grail product for me, I will absolutely be purchasing it again (and again)!
faceoff_positive.headline: This stuff is amazing!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have 3a curls and bought this product because I ran out of my usual products while visiting family. The Ulta in their area didn't carry my other curly hair products so I purchased the AG line and I was really disappointed. I used this product on refresh day and wash day and the results were different. On refresh day with a bit of water to my hair, this product gave my hair the curl control that I needed. However, the next day was wash day and when I applied this to my hair, and after it dried, there was a visible white cast that turned into dandruff like flakes from the product. The flakes were excessive and when I tried to rinse out the areas that had a white cast, it only made the flakes worse making you look unhygienic. I returned the product within 3 days of purchase. I wouldn't recommend it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Leaves a white cast and dandruff in your hair
